plot: The adventures of the plucky Richard Panceliss, his intrepid intern, Smitty, and the true-hearted Temperance Friday as they solve mysteries and right wrongs.
title: The Pantsless Detective
plot_es: The adventures of the plucky Richard Panceliss, his intrepid intern, Smitty, and the true-hearted Temperance Friday as they solve mysteries and right wrongs.
plot_en: The adventures of the plucky Richard Panceliss, his intrepid intern, Smitty, and the true-hearted Temperance Friday as they solve mysteries and right wrongs.
